text.name: function_lumberStorage_spruce
text.text: This shed will allow you to store your spruce logs

text.name: function_lumberStorage_pine
text.text: This shed will allow you to store your pine logs

text.name: function_lumberPile_spruce
text.text: This pile will allow you to store your spruce logs

text.name: function_lumberPile_pine
text.text: This pile will allow you to store your pine logs

text.name: ChooseOutputAmount
text.text: Choose Number of Logs to Output

text.name: NoLogsToOutput
text.text: Not enough timber in storage to output a log

text.name: BadInputChipped
text.text: Invalid log types sent to wood chipper

text.name: FullStorage
text.text: Storage racks are full, extra logs ignored
